name: @prosopo/provider
author: Prosopo

scripts.test: yarn remove-test-container && docker compose up -d substrate-test-node && NODE_ENV=test ts-mocha tests/**/*.test.ts --timeout 120000
scripts.remove-test-container: CONTAINER=$(docker ps -q -f name=substrate-test-node) && docker stop $CONTAINER || true && docker rm $CONTAINER || true
scripts.dev-provider-register: yarn build && yarn start provider_register --fee=10 --serviceOrigin=https://localhost:8282 --payee=Provider --address=$(printenv | grep '^PROVIDER_ADDRESS' | cut -d '=' -f2)
scripts.dev-provider-stake: yarn build && yarn start provider_stake --value 10 --address=$(printenv | grep '^PROVIDER_ADDRESS' | cut -d '=' -f2)

description: > NOTE: The easiest way to deploy the Prosopo contract and run the Provider node is via the [integration repository](https://github.com/prosopo-io/integration/). The following instructions explain how to set up the repositories manually.
